testsuite.name: Scenario: Create an event with a cross-site scripting attack

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create an event with a cross-site scripting attack

testcase.name: And I wait until the calendar has been loaded
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create an event with a cross-site scripting attack

testcase.name: And I clicked the calendar "month" view button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create an event with a cross-site scripting attack

testcase.name: Then I assert the calendar displays the "month" view
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create an event with a cross-site scripting attack

testcase.name: Given I create an all day private calendar event "chvoy<script>alert(1)</script>umjrce2psz3" with a description "chvoy<script>alert(1)</script>umjrce2psz3"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create an event with a cross-site scripting attack

testcase.name: When I hover over a calendar event "chvoy"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create an event with a cross-site scripting attack

testcase.name: Then I do not see an alert with message "1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create an event with a cross-site scripting attack

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create an event with a cross-site scripting attack
